name: Good Night, Sweet Prince
description: Play as a police detective investigating the murder of the less-than-likable police chief. Depending on the amount of evidence found, the murderer may or may not go free. But when they discover who the true culprit is, will players be willing to put the case to rest? This project was made in Twine, and one play tester remarked at how the game had put his morals to the test.
